name: Sutaruga! Beta
description:
Controls:

Keyboard: WASD to move, Space to change colour, LMB to shoot, mouse to aim

Gamepad: Left Stick to move, Right stick to shoot, Right Trigger to change colour

How to play:

Collect crates to increase your score. You can only kill enemys of your color.

Note:

This is a beta. It's almost done, but not yet. The final game will probably feature more weapons, a leftie mode, menus and a proper tutorial.
